text: parana ekak atamo.

mewara janadhipathiwaranaya, ema sanwardhanaya thawaduratath shakthimath kara ganimata haki suwisheshi awasthawak.madhyama palath pradhana amathi sarath eekanayaka mahatha athulu shri lanka nidahas pakshaya niyojanaya karamin madhyama palathe paksha kriyakarin rasak me wishesha sakachchawata sahabhagi wi sitiya ha.
wirodhatha raliyakata sahabhagi wemin siti pirisak wetha mema praharaya ellawi atha.

'age asa aga' chithrapatayata hadagamage ekkala "sthrikaranaya" denis perera wisin 'gotayibara kolamata' manawa ek karana lada bawak ma dakimi.mema kathanga dwithwayehima ma dakina suwisheshi karanaya 'belahina purushayeku' wata sthrikaranaya gonu wa thibimath sthrikaranaya udwipanaya wimathaya.50' / 60' dashakayanhi lankeya nirmana thula sthriya 'wiktoriyanu' sampradayata samapathiwa purushayadhipathya samaga samapathawa thabannata yam uthsahayak gena thibuna.namuth,1980'dashakaya elabethma lankeya nirmana thula sthriwadi pilimbaibuwak widaha dakwannata wuna.meyata 1970 shri lankeya deshapalana saha aarthika wenaskamda balapanna lada bawa apa hamotama balu balmata watahenawa.kese wuwada ma 'gotayimbara kolama' ithama saralawa hadunwanne purushayata shishnaya nathi wi yama saha eya nawatha labimath athara kathawa lesayi.emenma oonama nirmanayak thula daknata labena 'panthi satana'mehi daknata nomathi wimen meya madhyama panthiye kiyawimak lesa madakinawa.

jathika kodiya pilibanda kamituwe achasana nirdesha 1950 pebarawari 13 chenida parlimenthuwata yojana kota .1951 pebarawari27 chenida parlimenthuwe di sabhagatha kota 1951 marthu 02 wenida parlimenthuwe sabha sammatha chi 1951 marthu 31 chenida parani parlimenthucha idiripita pradhana kodi gase nidahas shri lankawe nacha jathika kodiya garu agramathya di.es. senanayaka mahatha chisin osachana ladi.nawa jathika kodiya sammatha wieman anathuruwa prathama warata nidahas uthsawayakadi osawanu labuwe 1952 pebarawari 4 wanida ya.1972 di kodiye rathu kotuwe mulu hathare wu putu kakul hathara iwath kara bopath hada 4 k ekathu wiya.in pasu nawa jathika kodiya pramithi karyanshaya magin pala kala pothak magin niyama pramana sahithacha sammathayan idiripath kerini.
